oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Rehearsing for R.C.A. Session
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This recording is of Hank Snow and his band rehearsing for R.C.A. This recording is dated April 4, 1955. The following songs are featured on this recording: Cryin', Prayin', Waitin', and Hopin', I'm Glad To See You Once Again, Someone Mentioned Your Name, Can't Have You Blues, Love's Call From The Mountain, and I'm Glad I Got To See You Once Again. Tape is the tenth of an unidentified number of tapes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Loud feedback -- (00:20) Start of a tune and conversation -- (00:33) Cryin', Prayin', Waitin', and Hopin' (Hank Snow) -- (02:02) "Cryin', Prayin', Waitin', and Hopin'" cuts out and starts over (Hank Snow) -- (03:37) Undistinguishable conversation -- (03:54) Strumming and tuning -- (04:08) Cryin', Prayin', Waitin', and Hopin' (Hank Snow) -- (09:01) "Cryin', Prayin', Waitin', and Hopin'" starts up again (Hank Snow) -- (11:27) Undistinguishable conversation -- (11:36) I'm Glad To See You Once Again (Hank Snow) -- (13:12) Undistinguishable conversation -- (13:24) "I'm Glad To See You Once Again" starts -- (13:38) Undistinguishable conversation -- (13:46) I'm Glad To See You Once Again (Hank Snow) -- (16:38) Undistinguishable conversation -- (16:52) Someone Mentioned Your Name (Hank Snow) -- (20:04) Undistinguishable conversation -- (20:15) Someone Mentioned Your Name (Hank Snow) -- (23:34) Can't Have You Blues (Hank Snow) -- (28:03) Love's Call From The Mountain (Hank Snow) -- (29:16) I'm Glad I Got To See You Once Again [song ends abruptly] (Hank Snow) -- (30:27) Unidentified jazz music
